keyMoments.title: Crocodile's True Plan Revealed
keyMoments.description: Crocodile reveals that Baroque Works' entire purpose was to help him obtain the ancient weapon Pluton.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the true motivation behind the entire Baroque Works organization and Crocodile's takeover of Arabasta.

keyMoments.title: Miss Doublefinger Defeated
keyMoments.description: One of Baroque Works' Officer Agents, Miss Doublefinger, is defeated by Nami.
keyMoments.significance: Reduces Baroque Works' fighting force as the Straw Hats dismantle the organization.

keyMoments.title: Mr. 1 Engages Zoro
keyMoments.description: Mr. 1, the top male Officer Agent of Baroque Works, begins his battle with Roronoa Zoro.
keyMoments.significance: One of the final major confrontations between Baroque Works and the Straw Hat Pirates.

description: Baroque Works is a criminal organization led by Crocodile, ostensibly working as a bounty hunting group but actually created to help Crocodile take over Arabasta and obtain the ancient weapon Pluton.
